Jargon Term: Please follow the medications prescribed below. - You were started on a bowel regimen to help move your bowels (Senna and Docusate).
Please STOP your omeprazole given you are also on plavix and they can interact.
DECREASE your gabapentin to 300mg twice a day
There were not changes made to your medications, please continue your medication prior to admission

Jargon Term: Please call your PCP or go to the ED if you experience chest pain, palpitations, shortness of breath, nausea, vomiting, fevers, chills, or other concerning symptoms.
